"Subdue Caterdra'n":
"Berserk Dragonkin have repeatedly
attacked ARKS members in Amduscia's
Volcanic Caverns. A massive one has
been observed burrowing through
the planet's crust.
Urgent orders: Engage this creature,
designated \"Caterdra'n, \" and collect
data on its abilities.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
